title: How to Become Rich on Virtual Families 2

steps.title: Drag your person to their work area (kitchen, office, or workshop).
steps.content: Drag your person to their work area (kitchen, office, or workshop).

steps.title: Take the praising glove and use it on them 3 times.
steps.content: Take the praising glove and use it on them 3 times. They should say Running Away or Stop Nagging.

steps.title: Drag them back to their work area and repeat 9 more times.
steps.content: Drag them back to their work area and repeat 9 more times.
